int16_t dds ( uint32_t *  phase_acc,
int32_t  phase_rate 
)

Generate an integer tone sample.

Parameters:
phase_acc A pointer to a phase accumulator value.
phase_rate The phase increment to be applied.
Returns:
The signal amplitude, between -32767 and 32767.
